item.description:
Hi Ladies and gentlmen,

Since the weather is getter better in Boston, it's a good time to play sports!!!
Would you like to play sports? Such as Soccer, Kickball, Volley ball etc-.

We organize a "SPORTS MEETUP"!! We plan to play Kickball this time!
If you are interested in this event, please join us!!
Let's enjoy sports and make many good friends!

Place
We will play kickball at Danehy Park
It is located near Alewife station (Redline)
map
http://maps.google.co...

Meeting place
I'd like to meet members at Alewife station at 2:45pm
meeting spot is here
http://maps.google.co...

If you can't do that, please go to Danehy Park(location is point of map) directly.


Contact info
If you are worried whether you can meet us at Danehy Park, please send me e-mail. I tell you my mobile number.

Weather
If it will rain on Saturday, this event will be canceled.
If the weather looks bad that morning, please check your e-mail - I will send you our decision by 10 AM.

Preparation
I will bring a ball at Danehy Park.
The weather will be hot. So please bring your drink and towel and cap by yourself.

We are looking forward to enjoying sports with many good friends!!

Thanks
item.how_to_find_us: I'm looking for a good place to play sports now. When I decide, I tell you detail about this meetup.
item.name: Sports Meetup
